languages.text: {n}В облике Ардженты не осталось и следа прежней упрямой дерзости. Глаза ее глубоко запали, лицо кажется истощенным. Но исполненным незнакомого ранее отчаянного рвения.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}В облике Ардженты не осталось и следа прежней упрямой дерзости. Глаза ее глубоко запали, лицо кажется истощенным. Но исполненным незнакомого ранее отчаянного рвения.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta shows no sign of her former stubborn audacity. Her eyes have sunken, and her face looks haggard yet filled with a certain desperate zeal that you do not remember seeing before in her.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В облике Ардженты не осталось и следа прежней упрямой дерзости. Глаза ее глубоко запали, лицо кажется истощенным. Но исполненным незнакомого ранее отчаянного рвения.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta's appearance shows no sign of her former stubborn audacity. Her eyes have sunken, and her face looks haggard yet filled with a certain desperate zeal that you do not remember seeing within her.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta shows no sign of her former stubborn audacity. Her eyes have sunken, and her face looks haggard yet filled with a certain desperate zeal that you do not remember seeing before in her.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタには、以前のような強情かつ豪放な様子はなかった。彼女の目はくぼみ、顔はやつれている。そしてかつての彼女からは感じたことのない、ある種自暴自棄な熱意が漂っていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta shows no sign of her former stubborn audacity. Her eyes have sunken, and her face looks haggard yet filled with a certain desperate zeal that you do not remember seeing before in her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタには、以前のような強情かつ豪放な様子はなかった。彼女の目はくぼみ、顔はやつれている。そしてかつての彼女からは感じたことのない、ある種自暴自棄な熱意が漂っていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔以往的固执与傲慢已消失不见。她的双眼凹了下去，脸色看起来也很憔悴，但却充满了某种绝望的狂热。你以前从来没在她脸上见过这样的神色。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta shows no sign of her former stubborn audacity. Her eyes have sunken, and her face looks haggard yet filled with a certain desperate zeal that you do not remember seeing before in her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔以往的固执与傲慢已消失不见。她的双眼凹了下去，脸色看起来也很憔悴，但却充满了某种绝望的狂热。你以前从来没在她脸上见过这样的神色。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta ne montre plus aucun signe de l'audace et de l'entêtement que vous lui connaissiez jusqu'alors. Ses yeux sont creusés et ses traits hagards sont empreints d'une sorte de zèle désespéré que vous ne lui aviez encore jamais vu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta shows no sign of her former stubborn audacity. Her eyes have sunken, and her face looks haggard yet filled with a certain desperate zeal that you do not remember seeing before in her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta ne montre plus aucun signe de l'audace et de l'entêtement que vous lui connaissiez jusqu'alors. Ses yeux sont creusés et ses traits hagards sont empreints d'une sorte de zèle désespéré que vous ne lui aviez encore jamais vu.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta no muestra ni rastro de su anterior audacia testaruda. Sus ojos están hundidos y su rostro demacrado, pero lleno de un fervor desesperado que no recuerdas haber visto en ella antes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta shows no sign of her former stubborn audacity. Her eyes have sunken, and her face looks haggard yet filled with a certain desperate zeal that you do not remember seeing before in her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta no muestra ni rastro de su anterior audacia testaruda. Sus ojos están hundidos y su rostro demacrado, pero lleno de un fervor desesperado que no recuerdas haber visto en ella antes.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta zeigt kein Anzeichen ihrer früheren sturen Verwegenheit. Ihre Augen sind eingefallen, und ihr Gesicht ist hager, aber dennoch erfüllt von einem gewissen verzweifelten Eifer, den du an ihr bislang noch nicht bemerkt hast.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta shows no sign of her former stubborn audacity. Her eyes have sunken, and her face looks haggard yet filled with a certain desperate zeal that you do not remember seeing before in her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta zeigt kein Anzeichen ihrer früheren sturen Verwegenheit. Ihre Augen sind eingefallen, und ihr Gesicht ist hager, aber dennoch erfüllt von einem gewissen verzweifelten Eifer, den du an ihr bislang noch nicht bemerkt hast.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta'nın eski inatçı cüretkârlığından eser kalmamış. Gözleri soluklaşmış, yüzü de oldukça bitkin görünüyor. Ancak daha önce görmediğin muazzamlıkta bir şevk, Argenta'nın çehresini dolduruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta shows no sign of her former stubborn audacity. Her eyes have sunken, and her face looks haggard yet filled with a certain desperate zeal that you do not remember seeing before in her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta'nın eski inatçı cüretkârlığından eser kalmamış. Gözleri soluklaşmış ve yüzü oldukça bitkin görünüyor. Ancak daha önce karşılaşmadığın muazzam bir şevk, Argenta'nın çehresini dolduruyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
